title: Sniper Elite V2 SKIDROW Multiplayer Final Patch! English/Spanish
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

1 - Install the "skidrow" Game Version and leave it as it is without cracks.

2 - copy the content of folder:"1) Game Crack" to the instalation game folder

3 - install the "steam" program from the folder: "2) SteamInstall" and update it online

4 - copy the content of "3) SmartSteam" to the Steam instalation folder that should be
    (C:Program Files (x86)Steam) and create a desktop shortcut.

5 - go to steam instalation folder (C:Program Files (x86)Steam) and rename the file 
    "steam.exe" to "sev2steam.exe" and then create another desktop shortcut.

6 - run "setup.exe" from folder: "4) update 1.13 + All DLC Packs" 

7 - copy content of folder: "5) Sniper.Elite.V2.V1.11.Steamworks.Fix.Proper-RVTFiX" 
    to game folder. (C:Program Files (x86)RebellionSniperEliteV2)

8 - run desktop shortcut: "smartsteam.exe".

9 - run desktop shortcut:  "sev2steam.exe" and log into Steam with your account.

10- run the game from desktop shortcut!



INSTRUCCIONES: 

1 - instalar el juego de la version de "skidrow" tal cual estÃƒÂ¡. sin hacer cracks.

2 - copiar el contenido de "1) Game Crack" a la carpeta de instalacion del juego.

3 - instalar el program "steam"de la carpeta "2) SteamInstall" y actualizarlo.

4 - copiar el contenido de "3) SmartSteam"a la carpeta de instalacion de Steam 
    (C:Program Files (x86)Steam) y crear acceso directo al escritorio.

5 - ir a la carpeta de instalacion de Steam (C:Program Files (x86)Steam),
    renombrar el archivo"steam.exe" a "sev2steam.exe" y crear acceso directo al escritorio.

6 - Instalar "setup.exe" de la carpeta "4) update 1.13 + All DLC Packs" 

7 - Copiar el contenido de la carpeta "5) Sniper.Elite.V2.V1.11.Steamworks.Fix.Proper-RVTFiX" 
    a la carpeta del juego. (C:Program Files (x86)RebellionSniperEliteV2)

8 - ejecutar el acceso directo "smartsteam.exe" que deberia estar en el escritorio.

9 - ejecutar el acceso directo "sev2steam.exe" que deberia estar en el escritorio
    y Loguearte con una cuenta Steam.

10- Correr el juego desde acceso directo en el escritorio.






==HELP SECTION==

HOW TO FIX GAME CRASHES
	-If "ALI213.dll" got detected, disable Anti-Virus.
	-Run the SniperEliteV2.exe as Administrator.
	-If you have a black screen, press ALT + Enter.
	-Ensure you deleted the "steam_API.dll" from the bin folder.

HOW TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Make sure you both have the same version and both start the game.
Host your game, Invite your friend through Steam overlay.




===THANKS===

Special thanks to Chuchomr (Lone Wolf) for assistance and translations.
